message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with coding for distributed storage systems, which is a topic that falls under the intersection of several CS sub-fields. The use of convolutional codes suggests that the paper may be related to information theory (cs.IT) or data structures (cs.DS). The focus on local repair and sliding-window repair suggests that the paper may also be related to distributed computing (cs.DC) or systems and control (cs.SI). Finally, the use of partial maximum distance profile codes suggests that the paper may also be related to networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
